Changelog:
(b98.1)

- Fixed cart softlock
- Mobs can not be spawned in crystals
Better trapdoor generation
- Balance changes
- Other bugfixes

(b97.1)

- Mines are much smaller. Thanks YoYo games mobile runner.
- Heavy blade fix
- Typo fixes

(b97.0)

- Mines generation overhaul. Now it looks more natural
It can be one big cave, a couple of smaller regions connected with carts, and a veins of radioactive crystal clusters
Since the floor is bigger, number of sub-areas was shorten by two (3 floors in short mode, 5 in classic)
(May lags on some devices)
- Minimap is now aviable for mobile controls
- Big Mole, Phantom and Illusioner buffs
- New system of crystal radiation
- Menu gradient now displays correct on most devices (not tested actually)
- Hardmode bosses now are elites
- Some elite bosses has buffed patterns and attacks
- Cycles now separate to hardmode
- Some modloader api changes (still WIP)
- Balance changes
- Bugfixes
- Custom error handler
- Better update notifier
